meanings.definition: The study of the structure of living organisms.
meanings.sent1: In anatomy class, we learn about the different parts of animals and plants.
meanings.sent2: Doctors use anatomy to understand how our bodies work.
meanings.sent3: Studying anatomy can be fun when you get to see all the bones and muscles.
meanings.sent4: The anatomy of a tree reveals its inner workings like a hidden puzzle.
meanings.sent5: She visualized the anatomy of a flower in intricate detail.

meanings.definition: The bodily structure of a plant or animal.
meanings.sent1: The anatomy of a cat includes its fur, whiskers, and tail.
meanings.sent2: Zoologists study the anatomy of various creatures to understand their behaviors.
meanings.sent3: The anatomy of a giraffe's long neck always makes me smile.
meanings.sent4: The anatomy of a bird's wings allows it to soar through the sky with grace.
meanings.sent5: The anatomy of a fish enables it to swim swiftly in the water.

meanings.definition: The physical structure of an object or system.
meanings.sent1: Understanding the anatomy of a machine helps in fixing it when it breaks.
meanings.sent2: Engineers analyze the anatomy of buildings to ensure they are safe and sturdy.
meanings.sent3: The anatomy of a puzzle box can be tricky to figure out at first.
meanings.sent4: The anatomy of a computer consists of hardware and software components.
meanings.sent5: The anatomy of a city includes roads, buildings, and parks.
